trait.name: Brave
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:_ {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack:_ {@hit 2} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Self destruct
entries: KR-15 casts fireball on itself with a Dex save DC of 15

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Xandra is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:_ {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Enhanced Right Arm
entries: When Barroc rolls lower than 10 on his Longsword attack roll, he gets advantage

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Barroc makes two attacks. One with his Greataxe and one with his Longsword

action.name: Longsword
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:_ {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:_ {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Trip Attack (3/Day)
entries: When Barroc hits a creature with a weapon attack, he can expend one charge to attempt to knock the target down. +5 to the attack's damage roll, and if the target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength saving throw 13. On a failed save, he knocks the target {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Julec is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:_ {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:_ {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: Kalinda can use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Kalinda deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of one of its allies that isn't incapacitated and the rogue doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Boots of the winding path
entries: While wearing these boots, a creature can teleport up to 15 feet as a bonus action to an unoccupied space the creature can see. The creature must have occupied that space at some point during the current turn.

action.name: Dagger
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:_ {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack:_ {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.
